mapper.select: select profile, r.* from user inner join (select channel.*, favorite.type from channel inner join favorite on channel.channelnum = favorite.channelnum where favorite.userid = #{userid} and favorite.type = 'bookmark') r on user.userid = r.userid
select video.*, h.* from video inner join (select * from myplaylist where userid = #{userid} and type = 'history') h on video.videonum= h.videonum;

select videonum, channelnum, userid, title, description, thumbnail, visibility, (TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, register, CURDATE())) register , views, likes, videofile, videotime from video where myplaylist.userid = #{userid}) r on user.userid = r.userid
